SCANNING_HISTORY_SHOWN: Scanning history will be shown here
CAMERA_PAUSE_EXPLAIN: When scanning, the app keeps detecting the motion of your device. If the device is motionless for a time, the scanning and camera preview will be paused to save battery. Choose Never to disable the function.
SUPPORT_DEV_EXPLAIN: Simple QR is a free-of-charge and open-source project. If you would like to contribute financially to the project or support me, please feel free to click to watch ads. Thanks for your contribution!
NEW_CONTACT_TIP: Only name, phone number and email address can be saved.

MSG.CALL_PHONE: Are you sure to call {phoneNumber} now?
MSG.SEARCH: Which content do you want to search for?
MSG.COPY_TEXT: Which content do you want to copy?
MSG.SHARE_QR:
Just scan it!

Shared by Simple QR
MSG.EXIT_APP: Do you want to leave now?
MSG.CAMERA_PERMISSION_1: Press Setting to grant camera permission.
MSG.CAMERA_PERMISSION_2: You must grant the camera permission for scanning.
MSG.CAMERA_PAUSED: The camera is paused to save battery. Hold the device to resume. You can go Setting to configure the function.
MSG.UNDO_DELETE: You can undo the deletion in 5 seconds
MSG.REMOVE_ALL_RECORD: Are you sure to remove all records? This action cannot be undone.
MSG.GIVE_NAME_CONTACT: Give a name to the contact
